D

dealer - Static variable in class controller.GameLogic
 
dealerTurn() - Method in class controller.GameLogic
Simulates the dealer's turn by drawing cards until the sum is 17 or higher.
deck - Static variable in class controller.GameLogic
 
Deck - Class in model
Represents a deck of playing cards.
Deck(int) - Constructor for class model.Deck
Constructs a deck with a specified number of standard decks combined together.
determineWinner() - Method in class controller.GameLogic
Determines the winner of the game based on the current sums of all players and the dealer.
drawCard() - Method in class model.Deck
Draws (removes and returns) a card from the top of the deck.
drawCards(Graphics, List<GameLogic.CardImageData>) - Method in class view.GameGUI
Draws a list of card images on the provided graphics context.
drawGame(Graphics) - Method in class view.GameGUI
Draws the current state of the game on the provided graphics context.
